title: Doctor Who Revelation of the Daleks Fan Edit
description: The aim of this fan edit is to refocus the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Revelation of the DaleksÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ serial into a single episode, with all extraneous material cut out, specifically most of what does not relate to the DoctorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s active participation, particularly in the first episode. This is also an opportunity to lend a more modern approach to the adventure: it will be faster-paced and streamlined, with all unnecessary detail rooted out. The silly stuff is out too: the DJ is completley cut and Davros no longer makes the stupid decision of luring the Doctor into Nekros. No more Doctor tombstone.
